content:
HL7 AUstralia now has an rss feed for Publications. In fact, there's 2 :grinning: :

  • http://hl7.org.au/fhir/package-feed.xml - a list of packages for computable consumption
  • http://hl7.org.au/fhir/publication-feed.xml - a list of publications for human readability

You can use either of them with your preferred RSS reader if you have one
